segments.text: As I observe the scene, I feel a mixture of emotions wash over me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s joy in the children’s playful heist, but anxiety lurking beneath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about the inevitability of something going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Will the woman finally realize before it’s too late?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me is rooting for the kids to get their cookies, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch the boy’s hand dive into the cookie jar, and it’s a mix of sweet and terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel the tension building as each second passes in this precarious balance.
segments.speaker: PAR
